Yeah from all the people I saw play this game, hologirls are pretty fast to get how mechanics work. On the other hand, absolutely everybody "look up" to enlarge stuff... I blame early stages design with all these high roofs.

@Zolwiku 
The curse of Forced Perspective. Sometimes the best way to expect something big is look up.
I'm not sure she's figured it all out, she keeps throwing objects straight up to make them bigger, but you just want to make them "farther away" so room corners are best.
